column5: Well, walleye opener is finally upon us (I guess actually at midnight). I know it has been a long wait for me since the itch started getting to me in February. For those not in northwestern Ontario (NWO), the weather is looking better, and we are poised to experience a much better opener than last year. The last few days have warmed up, and though some showers are in the weekend forecast, so too are temps in the upper-60s. It seems like good walleye weather. Hopefully there will be some good reports after the weekend. Well, gotta go, 'eyes be warned . . . NWO Fishing Bum

NWO - I'm sure I am not the only one that would like to hear how you do this weekend. If you find the time next week it would be much appreciated. Enjoyed the April download of info you gave a couple weeks back. I'm heading up on Thursday. Hope you slay em. Z
Me too. I appreciate NWO's observations & opinions here. When I retire, I'd like to be a NWO fishing bum !! :-)
leaving chicago in 1 hour....look out eyes...here we come!!!
